snippet: About 300 students, most of them from public universities in New York, rattled the Capitol with protests on Monday, denouncing tuition increases at public universities that were approved last year.
abstract: About 300 students, most of them from public universities in New York, rattled the Capitol with protests on Monday, denouncing tuition increases at public universities that were approved last year.

headline.main: Protests Over Tuition Increases Jolt the Capitol
